actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend section 122 of title 23, United States Code, to authorize payment of interest on bonds the proceeds of which were used for projects on the Interstate System.

summary.text: Authorizes payment of interest on bonds the proceeds of which were used for projects on the Interstate System. (Amends 23 U.S.C. 122)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 122 of title 23, United States Code, to authorize payment of interest on bonds the proceeds of which were used for projects on the Interstate System.
